changeSet.author: Jerry
changeSet.comment: register new workflow document types in RICE tables
changeSet.sql: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <data xmlns="ns:workflow" xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="ns:workflow resource:WorkflowData"> <documentTypes xmlns="ns:workflow/DocumentType" xsi:schemaLocation="ns:workflow/DocumentType resource:DocumentType"> <documentType> <name>ET</name> <label>EndowmentTransactionalDocument</label> <parent>KFST</parent> </documentType> </documentTypes> </data>
